Message:
I feel an immense power up ahead.
It must be the one who unleashed this Curse—the “Witch of Qlipha.”

But take a good look at that town.
We can’t even get near it because of the Curse.

At this rate, the whole country will be destroyed.
Someone’s got to stop her before that happens.

So that is the Curse of the “Witch of Qlipha...”
I never imagined it to be this horrifying...

...Wait. With how strong we are now,
we may be able to save that town.

The Staff has the power to restore the cursed land.
If it can do that, then it can possibly do the same
to any town ravaged by the Curse.

Of course, it’s easier said than done.
But if it’s you, then perhaps...
Please! Use your power and save them all!
